segments.text: Just as the saying goes , every potter praises his own pot . You should pay special attention to selling yourself properly in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is especially important for the graduates who step into the job market for the first time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better prepare what you are going to say in advance , in order to have a good performance in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The contents should be mainly descriptions of your background . And the length depends on the particular situation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only when you are aware of what the interviewer will be interested in , can you make a targeted preparation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To sell yourself successfully , you should leave the interviewer a deep impression .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Selling yourself should go straight to the point , and the statement should be clear and brief .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should also be truthful and realistic . Do not blindly blow your own horn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should particularly state your strong points which are closely related to the position you are applying for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: While you should not omit your weak points , they need to be described appropriately
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Time permitted , you could add certain examples to your description .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides , in the interview , it is best that you make corresponding adjustments to apply your prepared contents flexibly .
segments.speaker: S2
